definition: Yanjing, an old name for Beijing/capital of Yan at different periods
swallow (family Hirundinidae)/old variant of 宴[yan4]
variant of 燕[yan4]

Yan, a vassal state of Zhou in modern Hebei and Liaoning/north Hebei/the four Yan kingdoms of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Yan 前燕 (337-370), Later Yan 後燕|后燕 (384-409), Southern Yan 南燕 (398-410), Northern Yan 北燕 (409-436)/surname Yan
abbr. for Beijing/surname Jing/Jing ethnic minority
capital city of a country/big/algebraic term for a large number (old)/artificial mound (old)
Yanjing or Yenching University, Christian university in Beijing founded in 1919
Yanjing beer (Beijing beer brand)

sentences.english: Bartender:How about Yanjing Beer?It's very popular here.
sentences.chinese: 燕京啤酒怎么样？在这儿很受欢迎的。

sentences.english: The Harvard-Yenching Library founded by him has become a treasure house for Chinese studies.
sentences.chinese: 他创建的哈佛燕京图书馆，成为西方汉学研究的宝库。

sentences.english: In the new millennium, China Yin King will closely proceed with partners worldwide hin hand.
sentences.chinese: 在新世纪，燕京行愿和各地朋友紧密携手前进。

sentences.english: Yanjing Suishiji (Yanjing Age in Mind) described it as "mutton-roasting and cake-sharing".
sentences.chinese: 《燕京岁时记》里就提到在重阳节要“烤肉分糕”。

sentences.english: How about Yanjing Beer? It's very popular here.
sentences.chinese: 燕京啤酒怎么样？在这儿很受欢迎的。

sentences.english: After graduating, she won a Yenching Fellowship to study Chinese at Peking University in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 毕业后，获得燕京奖学金前往北京大学学习汉语。

sentences.english: Just at this time, the square madam brings the son to Yan city.
sentences.chinese: 正在这时，方夫人带着儿子到了燕京。

sentences.english: Yanjing is the official beer served at state banquets honoring foreign leaders and other dignitaries.
sentences.chinese: 燕京啤酒目前是国宴啤酒。

definition: capital of a country
capital of a country (literary)
Bianjing, Northern Song capital, now called Kaifeng 開封|开封[Kai1 feng1], Henan
provincial capital
old name of Kaifeng 開封|开封[Kai1 feng1]
old name for Beijing 北京[Bei3 jing1]
Qingzhou county level city in Weifang 濰坊|潍坊[Wei2 fang1], Shandong
Gyeonggi Province, South Korea, surrounding Seoul and Incheon, capital Suweon City 水原市[Shui3 yuan2 shi4]
capital city and its surrounding area
Yinzhou district of Tieling city 鐵嶺市|铁岭市, Liaoning
imperial capital
Qingzhou, ancient northern province/Gyeongju City, South Korea
Imperial City, inner part of Beijing, with the Forbidden City at its center
Kaifeng prefecture-level city in Henan, old capital of Northern Song, former provincial capital of Henan/old name Bianliang 汴梁
Youzhou, ancient province in north Hebei and Liaoning/Fanyang 範陽|范阳 ancient city near modern Beijing
Pyongsong (city in North Korea)
to enter the capital/to go to Beijing
